Fina, Dragon Rider.name: Fina, Dragon Rider

You have no maximum hand size.

Velan, Cursed Empress.name: Velan, Cursed Empress

When an opponent gains life, you lose that much life.
When an opponent loses life, you gain that much life.

At the beginning of each opponent's end step, if you took no damage that turn, put a heroism counter on Luxos.

If you control one or more creatures of each color, creatures cannot attack.

{T}: Put a targeting counter on target nonland permanent.
{T}: Destroy all permanents with targeting counters on them.

If a source you control would deal damage to a permanent an opponent controls, it deals that much damage plus 1 instead.
